text: Tor Richter (20 April 1938 - 30 September 2010) was a Norwegian sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre rifle, prone event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Norwegian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Norway Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Stjørdal
title: Tor Richter
